name: German International School of Silicon Valley
description: An independent, dual language (German and English) nonprofit preschool–grade 12 school with a locations in San Francisco and Mountain View. Regular school hours are for Preschool & Kindergarten from 8:00 am to 1:30 pm, Grades 1-8 from 8:00 am to 1:50 pm, and Grades 9 - 12 from 8:00 am to 3:00pm. They also offer an afternoon program until 5:00 pm.
